mapper.update:
update risk_decision_result_detail
result_id = #{resultId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
time_cost = #{timeCost,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reject_reason_code = #{rejectReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suspend_time = #{suspendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
suspend_cnt = #{suspendCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
suspend_stage = #{suspendStage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update risk_decision_result_detail set result_id = #{resultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, time_cost = #{timeCost,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reject_reason_code = #{rejectReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suspend_time = #{suspendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, suspend_cnt = #{suspendCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suspend_stage = #{suspendStage,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`name`,b.`data`,b.result,FROM_UNIXTIME(b.add_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') addTime FROM risk_decision_rule a, risk_decision_result_detail b WHERE a.id = b.rule_id AND b.result_id = ( SELECT max(id) FROM risk_decision_result WHERE nid = #{0}) ORDER BY b.id
